text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins watched TV. She changed the channels. The US was at war in Iraq then. She saw TV shows about people. They wanted to win money. She also saw news about the war. Suzanne felt these two things mixed in a strange way. Then she got an idea for a book.
